TENEO_ENGINE_URL.description: Please input your Teneo Engine URL. https://some.engine/instance/

LOCALE.description: Optional language code. Used for things like the placeholder text in the input box. Defaults to 'en' if left blank.

MS_COGNITIVE_ASR_SUBSCRIPTION_KEY.description: Subscription key for ASR of Microsoft Cognitive services

MS_COGNITIVE_ASR_REGION.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces region for ASR

MS_COGNITIVE_ASR_SUBSCRIPTION_ONLY.description: Indicates for ASR if the step to obtain the MS auth token should be skipped and subscription key should be used directly

MS_COGNITIVE_ASR_CUSTOM_AUTH_TOKEN_URL.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces custom URL for ASR to obtain the authorization token from (optional, if you want to overwrite the one based on region)

MS_COGNITIVE_ASR_ENDPOINT.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces non-standard endpoint for ASR (including if the endpoint is standard, but it is using additional parameters)

MS_COGNITIVE_ASR_HOST.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces host for ASR. Format is 'protocol://host:port' where ':port' is optional. Standard resource path will be assumed.

MS_COGNITIVE_TTS_SUBSCRIPTION_KEY.description: Subscription key for TTS of Microsoft Cognitive services

MS_COGNITIVE_TTS_REGION.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces region for TTS

MS_COGNITIVE_TTS_SUBSCRIPTION_ONLY.description: Indicates for TTS if the step to obtain the MS auth token should be skipped and subscription key should be used directly

MS_COGNITIVE_TTS_CUSTOM_AUTH_TOKEN_URL.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces custom URL for TTS to obtain the authorization token from (optional, if you want to overwrite the one based on region)

MS_COGNITIVE_TTS_ENDPOINT.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces non-standard endpoint for TTS (including if the endpoint is standard, but it is using additional parameters)

MS_COGNITIVE_TTS_HOST.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces host for TTS. Format is 'protocol://host:port' where ':port' is optional. Standard resource path will be assumed.

MS_COGNITIVE_SUBSCRIPTION_KEY.description: Subscription key for both ASR and TTS of Microsoft Cognitive services

MS_COGNITIVE_REGION.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces region for both ASR and TTS

MS_COGNITIVE_SUBSCRIPTION_ONLY.description: Indicates for both ASR and TTS if the step to obtain the MS auth token should be skipped and subscription key should be used directly

MS_COGNITIVE_CUSTOM_AUTH_TOKEN_URL.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces custom URL for both ASR and TTS to obtain the authorization token from (optional, if you want to overwrite the one based on region)

MS_COGNITIVE_ENDPOINT.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces non-standard endpoint for both ASR and TTS (including if the endpoint is standard, but it is using additional parameters)

MS_COGNITIVE_HOST.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces host for both ASR and TTS. Format is 'protocol://host:port' where ':port' is optional. Standard resource path will be assumed.
